name: Saint Tryphon
summary: Tryphon of Constantinople was a 10th-century Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople. He is venerated as a saint in the Eastern Orthodox Church.
biography: Tryphon of Constantinople was a 10th-century Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople. He is venerated as a saint in the Eastern Orthodox Church.
